TopicTitle: Space Shuttle Pack for ksp 1.0.4 dev thread

ok I will fix the tailfin issue. its unitys collision mesh. I will make it node attach

good morning ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) crew cabin 2 works, crew cabin windows doesnt. cc1 dunno yet, too lazy to assemble. i will try later today.

typos as usual.

Mike, you can remove my flying instructions at the front page. They are no longer valid with the new aero update.

Maybe you should now fix 1 single download file with al the latest updates (including the tailfin fix and enginemount flap) and strip down the first post to make it clear for everyone.

> 
> Are you using the monopropellant dump valve with the oms engines? That could be your problem

what do you mean? how can i change that?
It is a part looking just like the OMS with 1 Thrust and 1 ISp. remove it or change the staging for it.
reporting in for work. how is everyone tonight?

Head aches...^^ i tested several mods, with your mod for shipping to LKO until 4 am...6 am my little daughter woke me up...![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

FYI: it is 1.07 pm here ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

We should all meet up in teamspeak someday.

If you need someone to go through the config files, setup the thrusts, fuel usage even aero dynamics then ill be free after next wednesday (my second to last GCSE) Just wondering if you need someone to sort out the more boring parts so you can concentate on the texures IVA and body flap. I could take a look at the heat tile textures if you tell me what program to use ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) This also goes for the ISS pack and dream chaser

Edit: lol for some reason your shuttle photo didn't load XD, I would be more than happy to have a shot at this

your more than welcome to have a play with the files, textures, addons. even figure out what we could add to it.

what do you think the shuttle needs the most?

Hmm, have you looked into adding an airlock yet?? I think the most important atm is textures as these date back to about 2012. Also windows that let you see into the cargobay and the top ones for docking. The robot arm might have to be binned as that would take some serious scripting and stuff. Basically more \*immersiveness\* (yeah its a lot of things so no rush XD better quality > time taken)

Wait... Have you done canadarm already???? Sorry not keeping up at all, your work speed is amazing.........
